entry.title: What Remains When the Monument Falls
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,234Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 17

Summary: The Batcave had always held secrets, but none as raw as Jason Todd’s memorial—a shrine of glass and grief, a monument to the son Bruce Wayne had failed.Now, with the Batfamily closer than ever, Bruce decides it’s time to let go of the past. When Jason is summoned to the manor, he braces for the same old cycle of guilt and discord. Instead, he finds his father standing before the memorial, tools in hand, ready to shatter that symbol of pain once and for all.As the glass fractures, Jason is forced to confront the question that’s haunted him since he clawed his way out of the grave:Who is he now——when he’s no longer the dead Robin,—no longer the failed vigilante?

entry.title: The Psychic in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: Krisrift

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,845Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 386

Summary: Bruce has been Batman for a very long time and the wear and tear of the city’s innate tragedy is starting to get to him. Estranged from his kids, left by those he loved; only Alfred remains and even that bond is starting to fray.He has no idea how to fix any of this. Luckily, an eight year old psychic might be exactly what was needed to thaw his icy heart.OR:Shigeo might not be a Robin but hell if he wasn’t absolutely a Bat

entry.title: How to catch a bat
entry.summary:
Author: VHdeadinside

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,012Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 120

Summary: In a world where Batman never revealed his identity and everyone remains ignorant in the league, even though all the Robins are around and clearly the younger ones know who Batman is, Batman gets spotted leaving Wayne Manor and is apparently dating Bruce. Naturally this breaks poor Clark Kent's heart but all he can do is move on so long as Batman is happy. Except for the fact that Batman is never happy unless Superman is near him, so the idea of Clark suddenly dating men drive Batman insane, all the while Clark is nursing a poor broken heart with the support of the original league.

entry.title: Please don't take my sunshine away
entry.summary:
Author: iconstantlywanttoscream

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,215Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 224

Summary: Bruce’s stunned gaze gradually moves to the black figure on the floor. He stands there, unmoving, as shock and dread flood his veins. He thinks his lungs stopped working because he can’t seem to take another breath. Has he even taken a single breath since he woke up? He can’t remember. He tentatively lifts two fingers to his neck and waits a second. Then two, then three. Nothing. This can’t be real. He’s dreaming, has to be. What a cruel trick his mind decided to play on him.He squeezes his eyes shut and reopens them, hoping the scene will change. But the figure remains, a dark blot against the floor. Gathering whatever remains of his strength, he forces his legs to move and stumbles towards the figure and the kneeling Superman. As he gets closer, he realizes with a growing horror that the figure is wearing an unmistakable dark suit of armor with a tattered bat on its chest.---- or ----Bruce fucking dies (and haunts Superman)
